00007 Grid::Grid(double numResources) {
00008         //temp resource object
00009         Gresource res;
00010         //create output file
00011         output.open("grideData.txt");
00012         char fileName[30];
00013         totalMips = 0;
00014         totalLoad = 0;
00015         resourceUtiliziation = 0; 
00016         ios_base::fmtflags flags = output.flags();
00017         width = 20;
00018 //      string tab= "   ";
00019         
00020         output << left                      // Left-justify in each field
00021                 << "," << "#Tota Load"      // Then, repeatedly set the width
00022                 << "," << "Total Mips "     // and write some data
00023                 << "," << "Total Load/Mips"
00024                 << "," << "Resource Utilization"
00025 
00026                 << endl;
00027 //      output.flags(flags);
00028         //create numResource resources
00029         for(int i=0; i<numResources; i++) {
00030                 sprintf(fileName,"R%d_Data.txt",i);
00031                 resourceOutput[i].open(fileName);
00032                 resourceOutput[i] << left
00033                         << "," << "#LOAD"
00034                         << "," << "Mips"
00035                         << "," << "Load/Mips"
00036                         << "," << "Requests"
00037                         << "," << "Mis @ this step"
00038                         << "," << "MIs Executed @ this step"
00039                         << endl;
00040                 
00041                 res.id = i;
00042 //              res.mips = ((rand()%10)+1) * 1.2; 
00043                 res.mips = double(rand()) / double(RAND_MAX) * 10; 
00044                 
00045                 totalMips = totalMips + res.mips;
00046                 res.load = 0;//temporary value 
00047 
00048                 totalLoad = totalLoad + res.load;
00049                 res.reliability = double(rand()) / double(RAND_MAX);//temporary value
00050                 res.requests = 0;
00051                 //ResourceList.push_back(res);
00052                 gridResourceList.push_back(res);
00053 //              cout << res.id << " with mips: <<" << res.mips << " requests: "<< res.requests<< endl;
00054                 
00055                 if(res.load>0){
00056                         resourceUtiliziation++;
00057                 }
00058         }
00059         
00060         appendResourceUtilData();
00061         
00062 }//end Grid constructor

00110 void Grid::executeSchedule(Schedule schedule, vector<double> miReq) {
00111         
00112         
00113 //      cout << "GRID:" << "  -Recieved schedule with " << schedule.size() << " tasks and " << "miReq vector with " << miReq.size() << " values" << endl;
00114         
00115         //vector<int> results;
00116         
00117         //iterate through vectors
00118         for(int i= 0; i < schedule.size(); i++) {
00119                 
00120                 //get resourceID for each task in schedule
00121                 int resourceID = schedule.at(i);
00122                 
00123                 //get the mi requirement of each task in schedule
00124                 double taskMI =  miReq.at(i);
00125                 
00126                 //attempt to submit each task, storing result in result vector          
00127                 
00128                 //results.push_back();
00129                 Gresource res = gridResourceList.at(resourceID);//ResourceList[resourceID];
00130                 res.requests++;
00131         
00132 
00133                 res.load = res.load + taskMI;
00134                 thisMI[resourceID] = taskMI;
00135                 //return updated Gresource object to resourceList 
00136                 gridResourceList.at(resourceID) = res;
00137         }
00138 //      cout << "\n  -done submitting tasks\n" << endl;
00139 //      appendResourceUtilData();//^
00140         //return results;
00141 }//end executeSchedule

00171 void Grid::updateResourceLoadData(int iteartions){
00172         for(int i = 0; i < gridResourceList.size(); i++) {
00173         
00174                 //get each resource and update it's load if >0;
00175                 Gresource res = gridResourceList.at(i);
00176                 
00177                 //if res.load greater than zero, update load
00178 //              if(res.load > 0) { ;
00179                 thisMIExecuted[i] = (res.mips * (iteartions/250.0));//^
00180                 res.load = res.load - thisMIExecuted[i];
00181 //                      if new load is less than zero set it to zero
00182                         if(res.load < 0) {
00183                                 res.load = 0;   
00184                         }
00185                         
00186 //              }
00187                 gridResourceList.at(i) = res;//^ put the resource back
00188         }
00189 //      appendResourceUtilData();//^
00190 }

00208 void Grid::appendResourceUtilData(){
00209 //      if (output.is_open()) {
00210 //              
00211 //              output << " " <<"\n";
00212 //      }else cout << "Unable to open file";
00213         
00214         resourceUtiliziation = 0;
00215         Gresource res;
00216         for(int i=0;i<this->gridResourceList.size();i++){
00217                 res = gridResourceList.at(i);
00218                 resourceOutput[i] << left                      // Left-justify in each field
00219                         << "," << getResourceList().at(i).load       // and write some data
00220                         << "," << getResourceList().at(i).mips
00221                         << "," << (getResourceList().at(i).load/getResourceList().at(i).mips)
00222                         << "," << getResourceList().at(i).requests
00223                         << "," << thisMI[i] 
00224                         << "," << thisMIExecuted[i]
00225                         << endl;
00226                 totalLoad = totalLoad + getResourceList().at(i).load;
00227                 if(res.load>0){
00228                         resourceUtiliziation++;
00229                 }
00230         }
00231         output << left                      // Left-justify in each field
00232                 << "," << totalLoad      // Then, repeatedly set the width
00233                 << "," << totalMips       // and write some data
00234                 << "," << (totalLoad/totalMips)
00235                 << "," << (resourceUtiliziation/gridResourceList.size())*100.0
00236                 << endl;
00237         
00238 }
